data.scheme_name: Uttar Pradesh Solar Energy Policy 2022 - Solar Power Park Developers - Public Company - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme provides grid connectivity, 100% third-party power sale for projects above 1 MW, 100% exemption on stamp duty and electricity duty for 10 years for solar power parks.
data.eligibility: All existing public developers who wants to set up solar power park and contribute to clean energy generation in Uttar Pradesh are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
Land used for solar projects must have approval for non-agricultural use.

Solar projects need to be connected to the nearest grid substation, subject to technical feasibility.

Developers must enter into Power Purchase Agreements (PPA) with UPPCL.

Solar power projects must obtain deemed consent from the Pollution Control Board for establishing and operating the project.

data.nodal_agency: Uttar Pradesh New & Renewable Energy Development Agency (UPNEDA)
data.context: This policy is introduced to achieve a target of 22000MW Solar Power Projects up to 2026-27.
data.objective: The Uttar Pradesh Solar Energy Policy -2022 policy mainly focuses to provide low cost and reliable power to the people of UP, and to reduce the dependence on fossil fuels and achieve renewable power.
data.description:
Scheme provides various incentives for public sector Solar Power Park Developers:

Grid Connectivity: Allowed (subject to technical feasibility).

Third-Party Power Sale: Allowed 100% for projects above 1 MW.

Power Purchase by UPPCL: As per RPO obligation and commercial interest.

Stamp Duty: 100% exemption on land purchase/lease.

Electricity Duty: 100% exemption for 10 years.

Land Conversion: Deemed approval for converting agricultural land to non-agricultural.

Land Purchase: Deemed permission to purchase land beyond the prescribed limit (12.5 acres).

Pollution Control Consent: Deemed consent to establish and operate.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://niveshmitra.up.nic.in/register.aspx
data.funding_facilitator: Uttar Pradesh New & Renewable Energy Development Agency (UPNEDA)
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the incentives after the approval of project from the concerned authority.
data.additional_info:
UPNEDA will issue registration certificate which will facilitate the developer/firms to coordinate with department.

For approval of Solar Power Projects will carry out competitive bidding, execution of PPA, statutory clearances, and coordinate with MNRE.
